text: (FILE) Bauchi State Governor, Bala Mohammed. Bauchi state Governor, Bala Muhammed has mandated the use of chloroquine and Zithromax to treat coronavirus patients in the state.The  #Bauchi #Chloroquine #Covid19 #Governor #Mandates #Media #Naira #News #Treat https://t.co/VKKfk5SSHx https://t.co/iI9LKTrh8Z
